name: Gem of the Gallows
data: It increases the users strength slightly.
It increases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'enhance criticals'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'critical'.
